heading: Can I speak my mind?
content: You're always free to share your honest perspectives and constructive feedback about Home Assistant in your content. Creator Network members are also given the chance to offer feedback about the monthly changes directly to the team before it releases.

heading: Will I get paid?
content: No, not from the Open Home Foundation. However, creators are free to monetize their content independently of the network.

heading: Do I need to pay?
content: No, there is no membership fee to join this group.

heading: How long does it take to hear back about my application to the Creator Network?
content: We work hard to get through every application we receive. If you haven't heard back, don't worry! You haven't been missed, we're still working through applications. If you aren't accepted into the program, you will receive an email notifying you — we don’t leave any creators in the dark.
